title: Requires electronic banking facilities be equipped with self-adhesive deposit envelopes
summary: Requires all banks, trust companies, savings and loan associations and other financial institutions that provide electronic banking services to replace moisture-activated adhesive deposit envelopes with self-adhesive deposit envelopes.
